vectors.subject: Security alert digest for cluster-e1
vectors.text: Automated digest from monitor-bot. This security alert is informational and already mitigated. See runbook: https://ops.example.net/runbooks/security-alert-digest

vectors.subject: Payment failed retry scheduled for billing-worker
vectors.text: Workflow update from finance-agent: payment failed during provider timeout and retry has been scheduled. Operator dashboard: https://billing.example.net/workflows/retry-4421

vectors.subject: Vendor feed snapshot for procurement analysis
vectors.text: The parsed vendor payload includes phrase "limited time offer" as raw data. This is a dataset sync notification and does not request user action.
